00070 // Util functions
00071 static inline void addStringError(ugene_exception_base & e, const std::string & err){
00072         std::string trace;
00073         if (std::string const * ste =boost::get_error_info<string_error>(e) )
00074         trace=*ste;
00075         e << string_error(trace+err+"\n");
00076 }
00077 
00078 static inline std::string fetchStringError(ugene_exception_base& e) {
00079         std::string trace;
00080         if (std::string const * ste =boost::get_error_info<string_error>(e))
00081                 trace = *ste;
00082         return trace;
00083 }
